description: Receives deployment requests from Telegram, parses configuration (commit hash, environment, branch, build parameters), triggers Jenkins pipeline via API, monitors build progress, and sends real-time status updates back to the user via Telegram.

result.deployment_id: Unique identifier for this deployment in format deploy-{timestamp}-{short_hash}
result.commit_hash: The Git commit hash being deployed
result.environment: Target deployment environment (dev, staging, qa, uat, production)
result.build_url: Jenkins build URL for this deployment
result.started_at: ISO 8601 timestamp when the deployment started
result.completed_at: ISO 8601 timestamp when the deployment completed, empty string if not completed
result.error_message: Error details if deployment failed, empty string if no error
result.message: Human-readable summary message for Telegram response
